mapper.insert: insert into paintboard (paintTitle, paintDes, paintImg, paintThumbImg, paintWriter, paintCategory) values (#{paintTitle}, #{paintDes}, #{paintImg}, #{paintThumbImg}, #{paintWriter}, #{paintCategory})
mapper.select: select paintNo, paintCategory, paintTitle, paintImg, paintThumbImg, paintDes, paintWriter, paintregDate, paintViewCnt from paintboard order by paintNo desc
select paintNo, paintCategory, paintTitle, paintImg, paintThumbImg, paintDes, paintWriter, paintregDate, paintViewCnt from paintboard where paintNo = #{paintNo}
mapper.update: update paintboard set paintTitle = #{paintTitle}, paintCategory = #{paintCategory}, paintImg = #{paintImg}, paintThumbImg = #{paintThumbImg}, paintWriter = #{paintWriter}, paintDes = #{paintDes} where paintNo = #{paintNo}
mapper.select: select paintNo, paintCategory, paintTitle, paintImg, paintThumbImg, paintWriter, paintregDate, paintViewCnt from paintboard order by paintNo desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

select paintNo, paintCategory, paintTitle, paintImg, paintThumbImg, paintWriter, paintregDate, paintViewCnt from paintboard
where paintTitle LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where paintWriter LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where paintCategory LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by paintNo desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

select count(paintNo) from paintboard
WHERE paintTitle LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE paintContent LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where paintCategory LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
